title: 1.5 fails to link librustc_llvm using Debian LLVM pkg
body:
Using LLVM Debian package of 3.7.1 release, the librustc_llvm fails to link with:

```
note: /usr/bin/ld.bfd.real: /usr/lib/llvm-3.7/lib/libLLVMInterpreter.a(Execution.o): unrecognized relocation (0x2a) in section `.text.startup._GLOBAL__sub_I_Execution.cpp'
```

Full log:

```
CFG_LLVM_LINKAGE_FILE=/home/sylvestre/dev/debian/rustc.git/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rt/llvmdeps.rs LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/home/sylvestre/dev/debian/rustc.git/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH   x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/rustc --cfg stage0 -C link-args="-Wl,-z,relro" -O --cfg rtopt -C prefer-dynamic -C no-stack-check --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu  -W warnings -L "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rt" -L native="/usr/lib/llvm-3.7/lib"     --out-dir x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib -C extra-filename=-35c36e89 src/librustc_llvm/lib.rs
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1

error: aborting due to previous error
/home/sylvestre/dev/debian/rustc.git/mk/target.mk:164: recipe for target 'x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/stamp.rustc_llvm' failed
```
